alert.note: Alert for Schoharie; Western Greene (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 04 at 2:01PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Greene and southeastern Schoharie Counties through 230 PM EDT... At 201 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Roxbury, or 17 miles west of Hunter, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Hunter, Windham, Gilboa, Prattsville, Ashland, Jewett, Lexington, Conesville, West Settlement, Mosquito Point, North Lexington, Maplecrest, Manorkill, Broome Center, Five Corners, Four Corners, North Settlement, West Jewett, South Jewett and West Conesville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM EDT for east central New York.
